cardSwiper.title: Our Teachers
cardSwiper.subtitle: People who inspire learning and development

1.name: Kanybekov Maksat
1.role: Mentor in Product and Project Management
1.about: I teach programming at KOMTECHNO College and have been teaching Front-End for 2 years. Teaching helps me develop communication and leadership skills. I successfully combine work and study, passionate about creating web and mobile applications, and am growing in Mobile Development.

achievements.1: Graduated from Bishkek College with honors
achievements.2: Received a certificate for participating in the Startup Nation hackathon
achievements.3: Became a finalist in the Digital Technologies hackathon
achievements.4: Received a first-degree diploma at the Innovative Technologies conference

2.name: Petrov Danil
2.about: I teach programming at KOMTECHNO College and have been teaching Back-End for 5 years. Teaching helps me develop communication and leadership skills. I successfully combine work and study. I am an experienced developer with 5 years of experience. I teach Back-End development and train students to create scalable server applications.

achievements.2: Author of a Node.js course on Udemy
achievements.3: Winner of the Frontend Nation hackathon
achievements.4: Author of a React course on Udemy

3.name: Ernistov Danil
3.about: An experienced designer with 10 years of experience. I teach UI/UX design and help students create user-friendly interfaces. A designer with experience in large companies. I teach the basics of UI/UX design and help students create user-friendly interfaces.

achievements.1: Author of a Figma course on Coursera
achievements.2: Winner of the Future City hackathon
achievements.5: Author of a Figma course on Udemy

4.name: Ramzan
4.about: An experienced designer with 10 years of experience. I teach UI/UX design and help students create user-friendly interfaces. A designer with experience in large companies. I teach the basics of UI/UX design and help students create user-friendly interfaces.

achievements.1: Winner of the Design Awards 2022 competition
achievements.2: Author of a Figma course on Coursera
achievements.3: Winner of the Frontend Nation hackathon
achievements.4: Author of a Figma course on Udemy

5.name: Mambetkulov Ormon
5.about: An experienced developer with 3 years of experience. Worked on numerous projects, including websites and apps for colleges and businesses. My experience in creating interfaces and optimizing user experiences allows me to teach students how to create effective and user-friendly web solutions. I actively use libraries and frameworks like React and Material UI to develop interactive and dynamic applications.

achievements.3: Winner of the Future City hackathon

aboutPage.title: Comtehno
aboutPage.text: - This is a modern educational institution where students receive quality education and skills that are in demand in the labor market.
aboutPage.missionContent: We prepare professionals who combine knowledge with practice. In our case, theory is always backed by real experience: students participate in projects, internships, and solving current problems.
aboutPage.valuesContent: Our values are professionalism, innovation, responsibility, and a commitment to knowledge. We believe that only through honesty and teamwork can high results be achieved in education and career.
aboutPage.visionContent: We strive to create an educational environment in which every student can develop and apply knowledge in practice. Our graduates become professionals ready to meet the challenges of the modern world.
